document.full_text: pakistan has returned to the united states wreckage of a u.s. helicopter destroyed during the raid that killed osama bin laden, a pentagon official told reuters on tuesday, but the gesture was expected to do little to improve strained ties.
document.title: pakistan returns u.s. helicopter from bin laden raid
lines_and_colors: pakistan has returned to the united states wreckage of a u.s. helicopter destroyed during the raid that killed osama bin laden, a pentagon official told reuters on tuesday, but the gesture was expected to do little to improve strained ties.
